about_the_game:
"Emily & Candy: Hentai Puzzle 18+" is a puzzle game where the player assembles images of girls by rotating puzzle pieces. Once completed, the puzzles become available in the gallery.

The game tells the love story of Emily and Candy. The two girls have long felt attracted to each other but kept their feelings hidden. As they cross paths more frequently, they eventually find themselves alone together.

The gameplay is based on gradually progressing through levels. Initially, the girls appear in more modest clothing, but with each new stage, the player unlocks increasingly revealing illustrations. Throughout the game, the girls flirt with the player, making delightful sounds. Additionally, in the gallery, extra voice effects can be activated. (^.^)

Game Features

  • Hand-drawn artwork.

  • Animated illustrations.

  • Voice acting for the characters.

Special Abilities

  • Explosion – Destroys several unassembled puzzle pieces. Automatically regenerates.

  • Mega Explosion – Destroys a large number of unassembled pieces. Charges by completing levels.

  • Aim – Highlights unassembled pieces.

  • Stars – Periodically fall onto unassembled pieces to assist in puzzle completion.

  • Shadow Hand – Occasionally rotates other pieces along with yours.

Gallery

Here, you can view completed artworks and activate voice effects.

Characters

Emily

Age: 21
Appearance: A vibrant girl with long blonde hair tied in a high ponytail. She has a slim, athletic figure and an energetic gaze. She prefers wearing cropped tops, mini skirts, and sneakers.
Personality: Cheerful and energetic, she used to be a cheerleader. Loves sports, parties, and dancing. However, behind her smiles lies a fear of being misunderstood.
Special Traits: Emily has natural flexibility, making her incredibly graceful.

Candy

Appearance: A mysterious brunette with brown eyes and a seductive smile. Her hair is medium-length, styled in soft waves. She wears stylish leather jackets and form-fitting dresses.
Personality: Calm and confident but romantic at heart. She loves warm evenings, good music, and dreams of finding someone who truly understands her.
Special Traits: Candy plays the guitar well and writes poetry, though she keeps it a secret.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game contains explicit adult content, including fully nude characters and sexual activities. The game features:
Explicit Nudity: The characters are depicted fully nude in various stages of undress as the player progresses through the levels.

The game tells the love story of Emily and Candy. The two girls have long felt attracted to each other but kept their feelings hidden. As they cross paths more frequently, they eventually find themselves alone together.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i5 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i7 @ 2.7GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated standalone GPU w/ 1GB+ VRAM

name: Candy & Emily: Hentai Puzzle 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 CPU @ 2.6GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 555 w/ 1GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

*languages with full audio support
